column5: Do you see yourself working in a leadership or management role? Our one-year International Business Management MSc is designed to develop your knowledge of HR management, finance, marketing, strategy, and supply chain management in the context of international business.Our MSc in International Business Management programme equips you with the key skills needed for a variety of business roles in a global context.You will develop the ability to think and work across boundaries and borders be equipped for the changing role of business in today's interconnected society. You'll also learn about how businesses adapt to new opportunities and challenges including the Internet of Things, climate change and international cultural differences.
